parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From kata and echo; to hold down, in various applications.
Unbent, unyielding, resolute, firm. Not leaning, i.e. firm.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
A profession, confession. From the same as homologeo; acknowledgment.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From epi and the base of aggelos; to announce upon, i.e. to engage to do something, to assert something respecting oneself.
Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.
